description: Roleplay is always great fun when it's organised at the penthouse as a way to entertain guests. This must be taken care of right away, says Seb, stooping down to begin giving the boy a tender, long oral session followed by one of Seb famous, torture-ace hand-jobs that takes Alex over the top, shooting cum everywhere.
title: Alex Cumming & Sebastian Kane
